articles.author: Alexander Smith, Matt Bradley
articles.title: American runaway Pvt. King discussed by U.N. and North Korea - NBC News
articles.description: The future of Pvt. Travis King, the American soldier who ran across the border between South and North Korea, is being discussed by the U.N. and the North.
articles.content:
The United Nations is in talks with North Korea over the American soldier who fled across the heavily militarized border and into the secretive state last week, a top U.N. official said Monday.

articles.title: Korea Box Office: ‘Barbie’ Limps to Fourth Place Debut - Variety
articles.description: Margot Robbie, America Ferrara and director Greta Gerwig visited South Korea early on the promotional tour for ‘Barbie’ (without Ryan Gosling). But their charm failed to translate into strong box o…

articles.title: Ultra-processed food is a big part of the U.S. diet and it can make people sick : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: A diet composed of 80% ultra-processed foods led one British doctor to gain weight and feel unwell. Now, he's trying to nail down the health effects of this type of diet, which many Americans eat.
articles.content:
Dr. Chris Van Tulleken took part in a month-long experiment. He ate 80% of his calories from ultra-processed food. He explains what happened in his new book, Ultra-processed People.
